code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={position:1};var positionSlice=createSlice({name:"position",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setPosition:function setPosition(state,action){state.position=action.payload;}}});var setPosition=positionSlice.actions.setPosition;export{setPosition};export var selectPosition=function selectPosition(state){return state.position.position;};export default positionSlice.reducer;
